properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 10:49PM CST until January 22 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
...A Wintry Mix of Snow, Sleet, and Freezing Rain Possible
overnight and through Wednesday Morning until Noon central...

* WHAT...Snow, sleet, and freezing rain possible with freezing
rain posing minor impacts.

* WHERE...In Oklahoma, McCurtain County. In Arkansas, Sevier,
Howard and Little River Counties.

* WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and sleet after midnight will
gradually transition to freezing rain by daybreak. Up to a
quarter of an inch of snow along with freezing rain
accumulations less than a tenth of an inch on elevated
surfaces may be possible. Motorists should exercise caution on
area roadways due to the potential of freezing rain.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY
